name: Fishing With Dad (Ema)
description:
🎣 Fishing With Dad 🐠

Find all the fish by resolving three little puzzles, and make your Dad proud ! 

🎣  🎣  🎣 

This little gaming experiment was made for the first round of GDKO2023. The inspiration were this poem about fish by  Elizabeth Bishop (most of the text in the game come from there), this collection of picture from Flickr The Commons, and a lot of weird musics on youtube that I couldn't use. It's been a long time since I have coded anything so this was a lot of fun !

(Just to be clear, this is one level, with 3 puzzles in a single location)

  • Music : The conversationalist and Bordet fanns by criptic scenery 
  • Sounds are all from Zapsplat (wonderful ressources)
  • Font is by me
